item.title: The Quiz (Part 1)
item.description: Preface Imagine for a moment that you are interested in knowing the molecular function of some well-studied extracellular matrix proteins (don’t leave yet). Some would suggest that we’d find out by simply opening a book. Others would argue that we should simply open Rstudio. But how will we put our knowledge to the test? The answer – is with a quiz. Objective Given a list of protein names, describe their molecular function using a data-mining approach.
